programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne always dreamed of meeting extra terrestrial life but that dream becomes a nightmare when the gang gets caught up in the mystery of a scary Alien Monster.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy takes the Gang to the Minor League Baseball stadium of his youth only to learn that its about to be shut down because a Ghostly Baseball Player is scaring away the fans!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When an Artificial Intelligence takes over the building of a trendy tech company, the gang has to solve the computerized mystery - and maybe learn a lesson about relying too much on technology.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Gang has seats on the largest airplane ever to fly the open airways! Unfortunately the plane is also beset by a Gremlin bent on sabotaging the flight! The Gang has to step up to solve the airborne mystery as well as deal with something even scarier: Daphne flying a plane!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When a rich man writes Scooby into his will, the gang must spend a night in his creepy mansion with kooky relatives and a spooky phantom to collect Scoobys share.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a science museum in the desert where Wile E. Coyote becomes distracted by the Road Runner.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Mayor Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a water wheel in the forest where Porky worries about a mythical creature named “Big Feet.”

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build Tibs Squirrel a closet in his tree, but it won’t fit all of Tibs’ stuff and he doesn’t want to get rid of anything.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders enter a sandcastle building contest, Tweety sees the competition and loses confidence in his idea.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Hector hires The Looney Builders to build him a burger restaurant, but Daffy is so focused on beating his handheld game that he causes major setbacks.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he takes down Riddler with an impressive wheel slam move, the Batwheels give Buff the nickname Tough Buff. But Buff abruptly bristles at the name, leading the Batwheels to realize that its not okay to call your friends nicknames that they dont like.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song! Theyll need to learn to harmonize as a team to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave, unbeknownst to the rest of the Bat-Family.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Jestah injures herself preparing for an extreme sports competition with the other Zoomers, Bibi helps her overcome her fear of going to the mechanic so she can heal up in time to compete.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buffs trusty winch is knocked out of action by Poison Ivy, he must learn to improvise and come up with creative solutions on the fly.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Snowy and Jestah team up to execute a mysterious plan involving rare freeze-berries, Batwing and Buff pair up to take on the dastardly duo, but Batwing decides to carry out the mission herself, putting both her and Buff at risk.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Sushi-Mushi’s excitement and pride over Chanterelle doing a portrait of him to hang in his restaurant turns to worry. What if his friends don’t like it? But, of course, Chanterelle would never let that happen.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to show the Mushies that they should fly high and follow their dreams, Mushpie starts leaf-gliding for the first time.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Puff wants to impress Sushi-Mushi by showing him how he can use his fog to steam food. But Sushi-Mushi thinks Puff wants to be his cooking rival!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and Lilit discover that each of them has a favourite beetle. This is great! They’re beetle buddies! However this quickly turns into a competition on who has the ‘best’ beetle...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having learnt that Starmush overcame his fear of the Dark Forest by staying a night there when he was a Mushler, Mush-Mush and Lilit convince Chep that they should do the same. But will they end up fearless or fearful?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers’ home-tree isn’t big enough to store all of Chep’s collections. So Chep goes all around Mushton to find a new home for them – and no way he’s letting them move out without him!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that several drops of Tabasco sauce poured into a rock fault releases powerful sprays of steam that propel them high into the sky on a pot lid.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind installations for a TV game, namely lots of food supplies – which are locked up. To access the keys and the food, participants must win team tests under the surveillance of a drone. The Lemmings are the yellow team. The red team is comprised of Grizzy, an oar, and a flabbergasted crab!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to avoid the Lemmings outboard speedboat, Grizzy punctures his air mattress and is propelled into a hidden grotto where he finds a conch decorated with Maori symbols that can control whales. Grizzy returns, proudly straddling his cetacean and chases the Lemmings from his peaceful spot. But the Lemmings imagination is equal to the size of this potential new playmate!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While arguing over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings happen upon a polar bear cub who is crying. When the little bear sees them, he wails even louder. Annoyed by his sobs, Grizzy and the rodents try to pacify him, but nothing works. After feeding and changing him, the baby finally falls asleep. How can they pick up their Yummy battle without waking the cub?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A meteorite falls not far from the cabin. While the Lemmings are sledding outside on a metal pot lid, their sled is abruptly drawn to the extraterrestrial boulder.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a long line of dominos in the cabin that ends with several giant ice blocks and a rocket outside. Weary of not finding the peace and calm he loves so dearly, Grizzy sabotages the game. The rocket hits an ice block and blows up the cabin. Grizzy gets his hands on a machine that can sculpt ice. The bear dreams of an igloo, but the Lemmings have other projects.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden, Mr. Bean attempts to sit beside her in the cool shade of her outdoor umbrella but Mrs. Wicket refuses. He decides to design his own umbrella for himself and Teddy. As he starts digging, he discovers - to his surprise - a bomb. He tries to disarm it, unfortunately, his attempt only accelerates its countdown.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is the champ of finding Mushables in their version of ‘hide-and-seek’ – ‘Hide your Hat’. The last one he needs to find is Mushpot. But Mushpot is the champ of hiding!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: With Sumush out of town, both Mush-Mush and Fung think that they are now the strongest Mushables in Mushton. But neither of them counts on the strength of Lilit and Miff!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is super happy to have Amanita become a collector as well. Until she starts getting better at collecting than he is!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers discover a super-sticky tree sap and use it to have lots of fun… until Mush-Mush gets stuck to Muddler’s back.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When things go missing from everyone’s home-trees, our Mushlers get on the case to catch the culprit.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry has his eyes set on Tom’s catch of the day and is determined to stand in the way. Tom is also bent on getting a taste of the sea one way or the other! Will they sink or swim?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to seduce the she-bear hes infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and slim down with the rangers bodybuilding equipment. But before starting his exercise routine, he will first have to settle the problem of the Lemmings, who are already using the machines as an amusement park.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By chance, Grizzy discovers that the rangers new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages. But the Lemmings see the new gadget more as a competition bumper car.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. He will finally be able to rid of the Lemmings, without even leaving the couch!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To make sure that the Lemmings dont snatch his chocolate spread while hes taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. The Lemmings try in vain to break into the fridge until they see Grizzy open the door while sleepwalking. Unfortunately, Grizzy wakes up at the crucial moment. The Lemmings do everything possible to make him fall back asleep as quick as possible.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have invented a new popcorn game which consists of throwing popcorn and catching it with their mouths. Grizzy notices that his lovely she-bear seems to be drawn by the scent of the grilled corn and decides to invite her over for a snack, just the two of them. But first, he must quickly recover the popcorn from the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear hes in love with, for she truly adores this rhythm. He finds a learning kit at the rangers home which has a dance carpet with footprints that light up in rhythm. The only problem is that Lemmings want the ghetto-blaster to continue their rave party to an entirely different beat.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy undergoes an identity crisis after a run-in with a metal pan. Can the Lemmings help him get back to normal?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the Lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and won’t come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wicket’s nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With a lion-tamers whip, a sugar bowl and lots of work, the Lemmings have successfully trained a caribou to go through their obstacle course. Grizzy cannot help but admire the performance. He decides to steal their idea, and the caribou, to create his own circus act and impress his lovely she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto the electronic version of the Ranger Lemming toy which is capable of reproducing the movements one teaches it, like a smart robot. Grizzy immediately grasps the potential of a robot that could perform chores with rapidity and precision, but the Lemmings would rather teach it to dance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Rangers cabin is equipped with an ultra-effective pest detector capable of sensing the presence of an intruder, then chasing it out by emitting a wave that instructs the creatures brain to leave at once. Grizzy and the Lemmings are no longer able to stay inside, until they discover that the boxs remote-control device allows you to select which type of animal will be spared or targeted by the wave.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds himself unwillingly caught up in a race between two teams of Lemmings. When he understands the stakes, he tries to win but loses. Grizzy has his pride: he wants a re-match.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have placed giant remote-controlled hydraulic jacks under the cabin to transform it into a life-sized rolling ball game. Grizzy, who in inclined to seasickness, tries to put things back in place. The cabin tips over into empty space.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is disturbed during his nap by flies buzzing incessantly around his head. When he realizes that the carnivorous plant upon which the Lemmings are playing rodeo feeds off flying insects, he decides to confiscate it and use it as an anti-fly weapon.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Scooby runs into an old kennel mate Axel who is a highly trained Police dog who thinks mystery of the Junk yard monster is too big a case for the gang.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When a successful video game company tries to convince Velma to work for them in San Francisco the gang becomes embroiled in the mystery of a video game villain.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Batwheels take on a new vehicular villain who keeps growing bigger and bigger, while learning that size doesnt always win the day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: While Green Lantern is having his spaceship repaired in the Batcave, the Batwheels want to play with his adorable alien pet, only to discover that this cute critter has wild alien powers!

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about doing funny voices.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Wile E. Coyote hires The Looney Builders to build him a house in the desert so he can be alone. The Road Runner tries to pay him a visit causing Wile E. to heighten his security measures.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by the town’s volunteer firefighters to build a fire truck. Duty calls and they build on the go as they make rescues throughout Looneyburg.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr Bean goes to watch his favorite TV show, he hears loud noises from the neighbors. He moves to the garden but he cannot escape the cacophony of trumpet drilling and crying babies. Bean starts thinking about revenge...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they don’t.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursue Lamput across a vast desert. Things go wrong and all three end up stranded with no way to call for help. Stuck with each other, the trio roam the desert as days turn into years and the Docs grow old. One day, they find a map that leads to a Fountain of Youth and a way out of the desert, but can they survive the journey across the harsh, sand sea?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs finally catch Lamput! Mission accomplished…and now they have nothing to do. Every other job to catch lab experiments gone rogue is a piece of cake compared to Lamput. Realizing that they’ve lost their lives’ purpose, Specs and Skinny decide to break Lamput out of the lab’s hi-tech prison so that they can go back to catching him again.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind installations for a TV game, namely lots of food supplies – which are locked up. To access the keys and the food, participants must win team tests under the surveillance of a drone. The Lemmings are the yellow team. The red team is comprised of Grizzy, an oar, and a flabbergasted crab!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to avoid the Lemmings outboard speedboat, Grizzy punctures his air mattress and is propelled into a hidden grotto where he finds a conch decorated with Maori symbols that can control whales. Grizzy returns, proudly straddling his cetacean and chases the Lemmings from his peaceful spot. But the Lemmings imagination is equal to the size of this potential new playmate!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While arguing over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings happen upon a polar bear cub who is crying. When the little bear sees them, he wails even louder. Annoyed by his sobs, Grizzy and the rodents try to pacify him, but nothing works. After feeding and changing him, the baby finally falls asleep. How can they pick up their Yummy battle without waking the cub?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A meteorite falls not far from the cabin. While the Lemmings are sledding outside on a metal pot lid, their sled is abruptly drawn to the extraterrestrial boulder.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a long line of dominos in the cabin that ends with several giant ice blocks and a rocket outside. Weary of not finding the peace and calm he loves so dearly, Grizzy sabotages the game. The rocket hits an ice block and blows up the cabin. Grizzy gets his hands on a machine that can sculpt ice. The bear dreams of an igloo, but the Lemmings have other projects.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry must keep Lil Quacker safe from Butch and Meathead so that he can testify to a crime in court.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A robot turns from friend to foe, forcing Tom, Jerry, Spike and Tuffy to team up in order to rid themselves of the invader.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry fight each other with the balloons that Rick has placed all over the house to surprise Ginger on their anniversary.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom must cut fire wood for the Manor fireplaces while Jerry harasses him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom battles Butch to prove to Toodles that hes the better gentlemen. While they battle it out Jerry calls in Cousin Muscles who demonstrate how a true gentleman really behaves.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. Can Bibi get free in time to unmask the imposter and save the day?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang goes on a camping trip, although they cant really agree on why. Freds desire for the gang to get in touch with their natural instincts and hones their mystery skills, turns into on-the-job training as Viking Ghosts attack and attempt to drive them away – or worse.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred staat terecht, veroordeeld voor het brein achter alle mysteries die hij heeft opgelost. Met de hulp van zijn advocaat, Daphne, gaan ze terug naar de gebeurtenissen van de dag in een stad die sinds de jaren 1950 was verlaten vanwege een giftige chemische lekkage waar een toxische mutant iedereen die in de buurt van de stad komt geterroriseert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet can’t touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wicket’s garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divya’s driving skills so take the karts for a “proper” race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun destroying ice towers. When Grizzy sees them, it inspires him to sculpt statues of himself. The Lemmings cannot resist the temptation to destroy the statues of Grizzy, who does everything in his power to protect them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A container adrift along the icefield will change the lives of Grizzy and the Lemmings: it’s an inexhaustible stock of chocolate spread! There is so much, that for the first time the close enemies have no need to fight over the treat. They entice a flock of penguins into hoisting the container out of the water. One of the penguins, who did not get his reward in fish, is disgruntled. Grizzy has him taste the Yummy, then throws the jar far away to get rid of the penguin. The chocolate treat spreads over the icefield. Fatal error?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses a fire extinguisher to chase the Lemmings from the living room so that he can take a nap, but the gadget accidentally flies out the window. It lands at the top of an ice cliff, causing a fissure, and the peak of the cliff topples. Amid the debris, the Lemmings discover a fearsome creature: the Yeti, who is looking for the guilty party. The Lemmings bring him to Grizzy, never dreaming that the giant will immediately fall in love with the Ranger’s cabin and throw a very original party.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are bored. A coconut rolls over to Grizzy’s feet, pulling the bear out of his state of torpor. He imagines a sort of face on the nut and decides to care for it, like a child with its doll. He has so much fun playing with his new toy that the Lemmings want to join in. But when the bear refuses, the Lemmings ruse: they hide inside other coconuts in hopes of being adopted by Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While bickering with the Lemmings over control of the TV, Grizzy sees an illustration that gives him an idea. In a medical book, a person whose leg is in a cast is being served dinner in front of a TV. Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle and shows the Lemmings the patient care illustrations. The imaginary invalid Grizzy is so convincing that the Lemmings fall for the trick. They think that the sooner Grizzy is healed, the sooner they will be able to throw him out of the cabin as planned.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the beach, the Lemmings have set up a mini funfair for tourists. Each attraction lets you to win tickets, which are then used to collect prizes from a vending machine. Grizzy, who is not very good at games of skill, steals the tickets collected by the Lemmings in order to obtain the jackpot. The Lemmings decide to create an attraction just for him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that oysters can make pearls almost instantaneously: just put an object inside their shell and it’s automatically coated with mother-of-pearl The game of marbles that the Lemmings have invented with pearls is driving Grizzy crazy. He manages to catapult the Lemmings far away. But at the ocean bottom, they discover a giant oyster. All they need to create a giant-scale marble game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have adopted a small exotic fish that’s lively and affectionate and have fun decorating its aquarium. Jealous, Grizzy finds a fish too, but his is expressionless and indifferent to the bear’s efforts to communicate. Grizzy plots to exchange the two fish behind the Lemmings backs. He puts the affectionate fish in an even bigger aquarium with a pharaonic decor and locks the lid. But the Lemmings have no intention of leaving their friend to Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings use all the cans and tins they can get their hands on to build a beach slide. Grizzy, annoyed at not finding his tinned fish to prepare his meal tray, recovers them from the Lemmings. In their struggle, Grizzy loses his badge! Grizzy and the Lemmings now fight over a valuable metal detector that each party needs to accomplish their goal: build a slide or find the beloved badge.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take a case from a mother tortoise to find out where her son Seymour is sneaking off to at night. They discover Seymour is self-training to win a championship boxing match, planning to pay off bills with the prize money so his mom can quit the car wash. When he offers Tom and Jerry a cut of the money to keep his secret, they take it and agree to train him—but it wont be easy.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom visits a haunted castle where a lovely gardener raises monster plants.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Skullie tells Tom that he wont have to sweat a visit from one of the spooks tonight. However, Tom is soon drawn to a full-length mirror that causes no shortage of trouble. As he gets pulled into the mirror, an evil reflection cat trades places with him. Tuffy and Jerry enter the mirror world too and must fight their reflection selves for survival.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Stinker, the trash-loving dog, comes by looking for help, Tom and Jerry arent inclined to take the case until they hear it involves a missing fortune. So, theyre disappointed when they find out Stinker is searching for a lost fortune cookie from his Chinese takeout to learn his fate. Retracing the dogs steps, they chase the fortune cookies trail through town.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After Tyke digs up, Hammy, Spikes lucky bone, Spike reburies it right away because its bad luck to remove it. Soon afterward, Tom gets a set of toy dog bones that do tricks, and he teases Spike and Tyke with them. When the whirly-bone buries itself and unearths Hammy for a second time, Spike recruits the other animals to help prevent the bad luck he expects.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A ghost paints a flattering portrait of Tom, but Tom is stingy with his payment and the ghost casts a spell on the portrait. Strange things start happening as the portrait absorbs injuries and calories that should be affecting Tom. However, soon Jerry and Tuffy figure out whats going on and use it to their advantage.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Santas Little Helpers
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are joined by Nibbles Mouse, aka Tuffy, as they ring in a wild wintertime celebration. Jerry and Tuffy are living the good life in Santas workshop until the day Tom is rescued by the Claus family! With Tom in the house, theres nothing but merry mayhem at the North Pole. But when the dust settles, can the comically destructive duo work together to save Christmas and learn the true meaning of friendship?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean would like to learn to play a Beethoven symphony, so he arranges a piano, a music book, a candlestick and a very patient piano teacher. It can be done this way too, Liberace!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi wishes she could live a rule-free life like Jestah, so she decides to only focus on having fun instead. But when her actions put Batgirl in danger, Bibi must put the fun aside to stop Harley and save her hero.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he takes down Riddler with an impressive wheel slam move, the Batwheels give Buff the nickname Tough Buff. But Buff abruptly bristles at the name, leading the Batwheels to realize that its not okay to call your friends nicknames that they dont like.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song! Theyll need to learn to harmonize as a team to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: Krypto smells something special in a holiday package, and in his eagerness to grab the gift he makes a mess of Metropolis’s festivities. / While escaping from a grizzly bear Ivandoe and Bert fall into an underground cave where a large Troll-woman in a party dress keeps them captive.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: When a black cat crosses Krypto’s path, he’s determined to catch it before Halloween night is through. / Once upon a time the Penguin boy visits the Bear. He tries to entertain him and involve him in various activities but the Penguin spends most of the time playing with Masha.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Daffys cool cousin Billy hires The Looney Builders to build her an art studio, Daffy tries to show off to prove how cool he is.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Mouse Sisters hire The Looney Builders to build a cheese cafe featuring a mural by Sylvester who is having a bad day.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about what it means to be someones friend.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize an obstacle course in their cabin. Grizzy ejects the Lemmings from the cabin and they crash onto an Incan temple where they discover a spheric object that can control the Earths rotation.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get hold of an old pinball machine and install it in the cabin. Their furious party interrupts Grizzys nap and the bear threatens to break the contraption.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy, a big chocolate lover, is growing a young cacao tree under an ultraviolet lamp. During a trampoline session, the Lemmings accidentally break the lamp, provoking a supernatural reaction.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: During a fight, Grizzy and the Lemmings stumble upon a Mayan temple lost in the jungle. Once inside, they set off a magic reaction that creates doubles of themselves at different ages. They now have a Grizzy babe and elderly Lemmings. Grizzy tries to get the young bear interested in a documentary on salmon, while the Lemmings want to initiate their ancestors to dance. But age differences are not so easily defeated.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Short on food supplies, Grizzy has gone out to gather fruit. He comes back with a basketful but discovers that the Lemmings have stolen the last of the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is stuck in the lab with a dangerous robot on the loose! It’s up to the combined effort of the two Docs and the entire Lab team to save him before it is too late.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are on holiday and board a high-speed train only to realise that Lamput is also on the same train, except he’s in First Class! During the train journey, the Docs try to get from Coach into First Class but are refused entry by the train’s Captain. They then disguise themselves as train staff and finally get in, ready to capture the unsuspecting Lamput.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs and Lamput are excited because the FunFair is in town! But after the Docs cause havoc for the Carnival Clown during his juggling act, Lamput tries to make things right. The Clown is delighted in his new found friend and the two of them disappear into his House of Fun, with the Docs giving chase. But not all is as it seems inside the mysterious fun house, and the Docs have to come up with a cunning plan to capture Lamput and avoid upsetting the Clown any more!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wicket’s pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbour’s house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes ‘man overboard’ and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean’s landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is kept awake by the deafening sound of roadworks outside his bedroom window, but a plot to restore peace by feeding the workmen goes spectacularly wrong.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy en Scooby ontdekken hun nieuwe lievelingseten wanneer de gang onderzoek doet naar het mysterie van een angstaanjagende voetballer die ronddwaalt in een snackfabriek!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang hits the ski slopes, although Daphnes more focused on nailing Fred with a revenge snowball. Their snowy fun is soon interrupted by the appearance of an evil Snowman Monster eager to scare all trespassers off his mountain.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brengt de gang mee naar Ierland om het oude kasteel van de Blake-familie te bezoeken. Terwijl de gang onder de indruk raakt van het smaragden eiland, worden ze gedwongen te heroverwegen hoe geweldig de oude mythes en legendes daadwerkelijk zijn door een ontmoeting met een verwoestende reus.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang enters the heart of the American Gothic South in order to help an attractive farmer who Fred wants to impress with his mystery-solving prowess. A horrifying Scarecrow has come to life and attempts to drive everyone off his farm.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang is honored to take part in the wedding of two close friends. But can Best Man Shaggy and Maid of Honor Daphne save their friend’s perfect day before it’s ruined by a tragic Ghost Bride bent on destroying everyone else’s happily ever after?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: De gang gaat naar een festival voor de Dag van de Doden. Daar komen ze erachter dat de geest van een oude legendarische crimineel, El Bandito, is teruggekeerd om de bevolking angst aan te jagen. Fred raakt geobsedeerd met het mysterie en wil onderdeel van de legende worden.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders help Petunia build a greenhouse, she can’t wait for the veggies to grow and does everything she can to speed up the process.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders prepare to host a big holiday lights festival in Looneyburg Park when an unexpected snowstorm prevents Looneyburgers from attending.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders prepare to host a big holiday lights festival in Looneyburg Park when an unexpected snowstorm prevents Looneyburgers from attending.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Marvin the Martian crash lands in Looneyburg, he’s in a hurry to leave and hires The Looney Builders to build him a spaceship.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build a doghouse on Mars for his puppy, K-9. Daffy soon bonds with K-9 and comes up with a plan to prolong their playtime.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When all of the Batwheels (except for Bam) mysteriously disappear, Bam enlists the help of A.D.A.M, the original Batmobile, to help save his friends. Along the way, Bam comes to appreciate the old-school mobiles different crimefighting style as they team up to take on the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Much to everyone’s surprise, Bam is secretly afraid of the dark. When Poison Ivy knocks out all the power in Gotham, Bam must conquer his fears to stop her.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Redbird tries his hand at espionage as “V-8, the Super-Spy”, he quickly realizes hes gotten in over his head.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has a terrible no-good day after she keeps messing up and lets Joker get away. She doesn’t think he can help Batgirl anymore, but a “bad today” doesn’t mean it’ll be a “bad tomorrow.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputer’s motherboard. / When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave. / Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show. / Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of Bat-Ball.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to “drive a mile in each other’s wheels” in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is the champ of finding Mushables in their version of ‘hide-and-seek’ – ‘Hide your Hat’. The last one he needs to find is Mushpot. But Mushpot is the champ of hiding!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: With Sumush out of town, both Mush-Mush and Fung think that they are now the strongest Mushables in Mushton. But neither of them counts on the strength of Lilit and Miff!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is super happy to have Amanita become a collector as well. Until she starts getting better at collecting than he is!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers discover a super-sticky tree sap and use it to have lots of fun… until Mush-Mush gets stuck to Muddler’s back.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When things go missing from everyone’s home-trees, our Mushlers get on the case to catch the culprit.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Morel notices a Mushlet who is too shy to join in with the others. He realizes why the Mushlet is so shy -- they are in awe of Mush-Mush. Morel gets Mush-Mush to boost the Mushlets confidence.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. They are licking their lips. As they fight, they accidentally send the coveted egg flying amidst a group of penguins where a couple of winged creatures adopt it. They sit on the egg as if it were their offspring. Not intimidated, Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to get their hands on it, but the entire bird colony intervenes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings open a nightclub with blasting music and a disco ball in an igloo they have built not far from the cabin. The noise prevents Grizzy from sleeping. The bear confiscates the disco ball and propels the Lemmings far into the distance. They land in an ice cave where they discover a console that lights up the stars in the sky and controls the northern lights. The canopy of heaven starts blinking. The Lemmings transform the ice field into an open-air discotheque!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up… a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Before an audience of penguins and walruses, two teams of Lemmings perform acrobatic high jumps, competing for the winning prize. When Grizzy accidentally jumps in, he quickly gets caught up in the game and the clapometer goes wild! Intoxicated by his victory, the bear is by no means a modest winner! But the Lemmings want their moment of glory in the limelight as well!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy fishes, a penguin comes over and sees that the bears bucket is empty. He decides to help him and catches piles of fish. Impressed, the bear brings the penguin back to the cabin, where a friendship rapidly strikes up. This pleasant and friendly new companion quickly arouses the Lemmings curiosity. They lure the penguin away on the sly and replace him with another one whos not nearly as clever. Grizzy will quickly see through the trickery.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy settles into the couch by the fireside, the Lemmings come charging into the living room on their new mount, the vacuum cleaner. Irritated, the bear throws the mechanical charger into the fireplace, which blows up. Freezing air sweeps into the cabin. Seeking a source of heat, Grizzy decides to move into the science station greenhouse where the temperature is controlled by a drone. But the bear is unaware of what he carries in his luggage: the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a new playmate: a walrus! The rodents ride the creature throughout the cabin, then make him slide down the roof before starting all over again.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy goes fishing, the Lemmings jump on the opportunity to transform the cabin into a giant ice slide. Upon his return, the bear puts an end to the rodents bobsleigh party and gets ready to savor his days catch. But the Lemmings steal his fish and draw the bear outside the cabin. Grizzy must try to recover his lunch while protecting his territory from a rodent invasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pinches a magic statue from the Lemmings that has the power to make objects appear in real life. All you have to do, is pin the photo of ones desires upon it. Too bad for the rodents snow-bike! Grizzy replaces the vehicles photo with the portrait of his beloved she-bear who stayed behind in Canada. Barely arrived in African, the she-bear disappears again, victim of the rodents trickery. It is the outbreak of a bitter dispute.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by the Lemmings new magnetic train, Grizzy propels the whole lot of them far from the cabin. The rodents land in the neighboring hut of a sorcerer and a mysterious mask falls onto one of them, endowing him with the power of telekinesis. The Lemmings are thrilled! They return to the cabin to explore this new magic power. Perched upon pieces of furniture, they fly around the room to finish their life-size flying train game!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it. After the passing motorist mistakenly thinks that Bean runs a car wash, Bean makes some makeshift car washing equipment at the side of the road. Mrs. Wicket joins Bean by offering tea to the motorist. Soon after, Bean is washing cars that belong to the Royal Queen but the same bird defecates on the car.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on vastuussa veljistaan silla aikaa kun vanhemmat ovat lomalla. Kun han kuulee, etta pojat aikovat matkustaa maailman ympari ja nauttia kesan pisimmasta paivasta, han lahtee harkitsematta heidan mukaansa. Bufordin, Baljeetin ja Isabellan kanssa kolmikko suuntaa Japaniin ja Ranskaan, jossa he oppivat uskomaan mahdottomiinkin asioihin. Buford lyo vetoa, etteivat Finias ja Ferb onnistu luomaan historian pisinta kesapaivaa… vaikka han salaa pitaakin heille peukkuja. Tohtori Tollontyo kidnappaa majuri Sahkeisen, jonka oli tarkoitus luennoida Hyvisten konferenssissa. Tollontyon tytar Vanessa ei ensin ilahdu siita, etta isa ottaa tyoasioita mukaan lomalle, mutta lopuksi tytto huomaa, etta hanenkin sisallaan asuu pieni pahis.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Saatuaan hammaskeijulta viiden dollarin setelin, Bluey on innoissaan menossa Isan kanssa kauppoihin kayttamaan rahansa! Mutta tutkiessaan kauppojen hyllyja ystavansa Indyn kanssa, on yha vaikeampi ostaa jotain. Kun tarjolla on kaikkea hevoskyydeista pannukakkuihin, on vaikea valita! Paniikinomaisen herateostoksen johdosta Bluey harmittelee, ettei voi ostaa laulua katusoittajalta. Indyn vakuuttelu, etta ”sen minka taakseen jattaa, edestaan loytaa” pitaa paikkansa kun viiden dollarin seteli matkaa ympari kauppaa ja Bluey saa uuden mahdollisuuden.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.desc: Kun Candace hukkaa kannykkansa ja rikkoo sitten aidilta saamansa uuden kannykan, han pelkaa joutuvansa pulaan. Mutta Finias ja Ferb korjaavat puhelimen ja lisaavat siihen runsaasti uusia toimintoja. Candace on tyytyvainen – kunnes puhelin telesiirtaa hanet Paasiaissaarille! Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo kehittaa Noutonaattorin. / Isa katselee lapsuutensa lempisarjaa, mutta television taikamattoajelu ei veda vertoja ajan kultaamille muistoille. Siispa Finias ja Ferb paattavat tehda hanelle oikean lentavan maton. Silla valin Candace yrittaa ennustaa tulevaisuutta onnenkeksien avulla ja tohtori Tollontyo on varastanut hankalasti puhdistettavia aineita Tahranaattoriaan varten.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Kun Isa vie Blueyn ja Bingon vaunuretkelle puistoon aikaisin aamulla, Bluey ei malta odottaa paastakseen rakkaalle kiipeilytelineelleen. Karsivallisyys joutuu kuitenkin koetukselle, kun Isa pysahtyy juttelemaan ystaviensa kanssa. Turhautunut Bluey keskeyttaa aikuisten keskustelut. Isa kaskee olemaan kohtelias, mutta vasta kun han huomaa Bingon leikkivan onnellisena, han tajuaa itsekin voivansa leikkia. Kun Isa seuraavan kerran pysahtyy juttelemaan bussipysakin lahelle, Bluey kehittaa Bingon kanssa oman bussileikkinsa ja houkuttelee Isankin mukaan. Kun kiire on ohi, Bluey rentoutuu ja nauttii matkasta.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Saatuaan hammaskeijulta viiden dollarin setelin, Bluey on innoissaan menossa Isan kanssa kauppoihin kayttamaan rahansa! Mutta tutkiessaan kauppojen hyllyja ystavansa Indyn kanssa, on yha vaikeampi ostaa jotain. Kun tarjolla on kaikkea hevoskyydeista pannukakkuihin, on vaikea valita! Paniikinomaisen herateostoksen johdosta Bluey harmittelee, ettei voi ostaa laulua katusoittajalta. Indyn vakuuttelu, etta ”sen minka taakseen jattaa, edestaan loytaa” pitaa paikkansa kun viiden dollarin seteli matkaa ympari kauppaa ja Bluey saa uuden mahdollisuuden.

programme.desc: Kun Isa vie Blueyn ja Bingon vaunuretkelle puistoon aikaisin aamulla, Bluey ei malta odottaa paastakseen rakkaalle kiipeilytelineelleen. Karsivallisyys joutuu kuitenkin koetukselle, kun Isa pysahtyy juttelemaan ystaviensa kanssa. Turhautunut Bluey keskeyttaa aikuisten keskustelut. Isa kaskee olemaan kohtelias, mutta vasta kun han huomaa Bingon leikkivan onnellisena, han tajuaa itsekin voivansa leikkia. Kun Isa seuraavan kerran pysahtyy juttelemaan bussipysakin lahelle, Bluey kehittaa Bingon kanssa oman bussileikkinsa ja houkuttelee Isankin mukaan. Kun kiire on ohi, Bluey rentoutuu ja nauttii matkasta.

Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo kehittaa alkukantaisen naattorin, jonka avulla han pyrkii viemaan asuinpaikan kehittyneemmilta lajitovereiltaan. / 1500-luvun Kiinassa pahamaineinen rosvopaallikko Tollokaani kaappaa hallitsijan tyttaren, prinsessa Isabellan. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun aiti tarjoutuu viettamaan koko paivan Candacen kanssa, tama on varma, etta paasee viimein karayttamaan veljensa – mutta he eivat teekaan mitaan mielenkiintoista! Perry epailee tohtori Tollontyon liittyvan asiaan ja paatyy avustamaan perivihollistaan. / Candace pyytaa, etta Stacy hypnotisoi hanet, niin etta han voi nauttia treffeista Jeremyn kanssa miettimatta veljiensa karayttamista. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo menettaa muistinsa uusimman naattorinsa takia ja Norm kayttaa tilaisuutta hyvakseen teeskennellakseen hanen poikaansa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on murtanut nilkkansa ja on toipilaana kun Finias ja Ferb rakentavat stratosfaarin ionisoijaa. Koska Candace haluaa silti paasta karayttamaan veljensaa, han joutuu keksimaan luovia keinoja saadakseen aidin huomion. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo valmistautuu hyokkaamaan Kanakeittonaattorillaan ja Perryn taytyy pysayttaa hanet. / Flynn-Fletcherit ovat palaamassa kotiin autoretkelta ja Finias ja Ferb paattavat rakentaa perinteisen amerikkalaisen tienvarsikahvilan retkiauton katolle. Silla valin Perryn taytyy estaa tohtori Tollontyota kuljettamasta rajahdysherkkaa nestetta kaupunkiin.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace innostuu kun pojat rakentavat jattiversion hanen lempilautapelistaan muuttamalla koko kaupungin Voropoli-pelilaudaksi. Silla valin Vanessa on telttaretkella ystaviensa kanssa ja tohtori Tollontyo pyytaa Perryn apua tyttarensa suojelemiseksi. / Kun Baljeet kertoo Finiakselle ja Ferbille sukunsa epaonnisesta polkupyorakilpailuhistoriasta, pojat rakentavat oman pyoraratansa, jotta han saisi voittaa. Silla valin Candace aikoo hankkia todisteita poikien puuhista uuden videokameransa avulla, mutta Tollontyon Ponnahdusnaattorin mainokset uhkaavat pilata hanen suunnitelmansa.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike on parast Tricia surma masenduses ja laheb pubis noore riiukukega liiga agedaks. Politsei on hammingus, kui rahukohtunik aitab poisil karistamatult vabaks saada. Nooruk šantažeerib rahukohtunikku ja talle sõidetakse autoga otsa. Mike lahendab kohtunik Robinsoni perekonnasaladuse ja tabab briljandivargad. Vernon pakub koolipõlvekallimale abi, kuid kahetseb seda kibedasti.

programme.title: Tana õhtul..
programme.desc: Olgu kaimas milline aastatuhat tahes, kaibigu meil kopikad või sendid - Singer Vingeri laulud lahevad eestlasele alati korda. Lisaks Hardi Volmerile teevad kõva haalt ka bandi sõbrad ja fanaatikud ning saatejuht Vahur Kersna.

programme.title: Terevisioon

Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kõik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Režissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: Terevisioonis on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised.

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Lenita toibub haiglas kallaletungist, kuid ei maleta midagi. Jannica usaldab Ainole oma saladuse. Ira uritab suud Ilmari kaela veeretada. Jari vasimus viib traagilise õnnetuseni.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: Maahommik toob ekraanile arksad ideed, tegusad inimesed ja huvitavad ettevõtmised.

programme.title: Laskesuusatamise MK-etapp
programme.desc: Kommenteerivad Tarmo Tiisler ja Karel Kulbin, kohapealt teeb intervjuusid Ivar Lepik.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Abel keeldub koju naasmast. Feliciano valmistub Currot jahil saatma. Lorenzo ahvardab Pelayot. Jana palub Manuelilt vabandust.

programme.title: Pealtnagija tahed
programme.desc: Pealtnagija tahed toob vaatajani saatesarja viimaste aastate saravaimad persoonid.

programme.title: Laskesuusatamise MK-etapp
programme.desc: Kommenteerivad Tarmo Tiisler ja Karel Kulbin, kohapealt teeb intervjuusid Ivar Lepik.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Jurka ahvardab Ruudi allkirjaga Ahvenat ja annab sama paberi ka Mare katte, et suust paaseda. Ülo tahab Kelliga tomatikasvandust arendada, kuid Richardil on samad plaanid. Alma kutsub Allani ja Mare enda juurde - ta on Jaanuselt kirja saanud. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Minister soovib Jariga kohtuda, kuid Jari ei taha teenimata tunnustust vastu võtta ja avaldab tõe. Jannica langetab raske otsuse. Jesse ei taha isa matustel osaleda, kuid Sonja soovitab seda siiski teha. Ilmari kunagine patsient Riina tuleb EMOsse.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Lorenzol tekib ootamatu tervisehada. Jana raagib Maríale varga tabamisest. Margarital on Verale eriulesanne. Curro saab jahil haavata.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: Ringvaade toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Luhhike oppetus Eesti kultuurist
programme.desc: Kui Eestimaal hakkas rahvuslik liikumine jumet võtma, ei haaranud eestlane mitte pussi, vaid hoopis hirmsama relva - pasuna! Saatejuhtidel Priit ja Mart Piusil aitavad arkamisajas orienteeruda Jurgen Rooste, Rasmus Puur, Indrek Laul, Kadi Polli ja paljud teised. Sarja stsenarist on Tauno Vahter, režissoor Raivo Maripuu, toimetaja Kai Vaartnõu ning kunstnik Karel Korp.

programme.title: Sport
